input.sentences: the lake was large and reflective .
the tress made an interesting reflection on the water as we walked .
the old wind machine had not been used in many years .
the beautiful estate was offset perfectly by the owners many animals .
output.sentences: I went for a walk by the lakeside.
The sky was cloudy but the lake was still and it reflected the clouds and the trees.
I found an open passage through some trees nearby and went through.
On the other side was a great open meadow with a windmill.
When I finally got home I greated my dear cow friend and went inside my castle to unwind from the long walk.
